title: Hetalia: The Beautiful World Extra Disc
original_name: ヘタリア The Beautiful World 僕がヒロインに囲まれ過ぎて世（ｒｙ
opening_song: "Hetalia no Utsukushiki Sekai (ヘタリアの美しき世界)" by Conisch (コーニッシュ)
ending_song: "Mawaru Chikyuu Rondo (まわる地球ロンド)" by Daisuke Namikawa
sinopse: Unaired episode adapted from the manga chapter "I Was Overwhelmed by Heroines."
